name: Complete Blowout Styling Milk
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is: A clean, lightweight, heat-activated styling cream that adds smoothness, style memory, and protection against heat and humidity...Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Concerns:.- Heat Protection.- Hold & Style Extending..Key Benefits:.- Provides Lasting Style Memory and Humidity Resistance.- Creates Transformative Styles with Bounce, Shine, and No Frizz.- Protects Hair Up to 450 Degrees Fahrenheit..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Hemisqualane: Superior to silicone, it improves hair health and strength quickly and over time..- Ionic Peptides: Help protect hair strands and cuticles from damage..- Cassia Bark Style Polymer: Provides hold, style memory, and humidity control...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Bring the heat for a total style transformation. This heat-activated, smoothing styler lets you achieve a smooth, soft, salon-level blowout. Blowout Milk is your ultimate defense from heat damage and humidity, for style that lasts all day long...This glass bottle is infinitely recyclable. The pump is 30 percent PCR PP Plastic. Carton and insert are both FSC board with soy-based inks...Fragrance Description: Sparkling grapefruit and tangerine are infused with white florals, soft violet, and sweet honey notes...Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Hemisqualane: A silicone alternative that improves hair health and strength. .-Iconic Peptides: Protect color and against damage and heat..-Cassia Bark Style Polymer: Provides hold, style memory, and humidity control...Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Hydrogenated Farnesene*, Cassia Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Saccharomyces Cerevisiae Extract, Brassicamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Squalane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cymbidium Grandiflorum (Orchid) Flower Extract, Panthenol, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Lemon Protein, Cetearyl Olivate, Tocopherol, Sorbitan Olivate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Aspartic Acid, Sodium Gluconate, Fragrance/Parfum, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Coumarin, Eugenol, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool, Methyl Ionones.*Sugarcane Derived Hemisqualane......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply one to two pumps in hands and rub together, disperse evenly over damp hair, and blow-dry with a round brush or heat style as desired...Recycling Instructions:.-Aluminum: Clean and dry contents as thoroughly as possible. Recycle in your community's approved aluminum bin..-Plastic caps: Caps are too small to be recycled by themselves. Keep them on the bottles; otherwise, they should be tossed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you're dreaming of smooth, shiny, and effortlessly styled hair like Jonathan Van Ness himself, look no further than the JVN Styling Milk. This lightweight leave-in treatment has quickly become a fan favorite, and for good reason.  Ease of Use and Application: Let's start with the simple stuff. Applying this milk is a breeze. A few pumps massaged into damp hair is all it takes. It blends seamlessly, leaving no greasy residue or sticky feeling behind. It even plays nice with other styling products, making it a versatile addition to your haircare routine.  The Rockstar Results: But the real magic happens when you unleash the heat. Blow drying with this milk in your hair is like giving your locks a first-class spa treatment. Frizz? Vanished. Flyaways? Tamed. Your hair emerges impossibly smooth, silky, and full of vibrant shine. The texture is transformed, feeling soft and healthy to the touch.  More Than Just Shine: But JVN Styling Milk isn't just a one-trick pony. It packs a punch of hair-loving benefits. The formula protects your strands from heat damage, up to a scorching 450u00b0F! Plus, it infuses your hair with nourishing ingredients like bionic peptides and cassia bark extract, leaving it feeling stronger and healthier with each use.  Sensory Delights: Top it all off with a scent that's pure luxury. Imagine a fresh citrus cocktail swirled with honey and a whisper of floral notes. It's the kind of fragrance that lingers in the air, leaving you feeling like you just stepped out of a salon, not your bathroom.  The Final Verdict: Whether you're a seasoned blow-dry pro or a heat-styling newbie, JVN Styling Milk deserves a spot in your haircare arsenal. It's the perfect combination of ease, effectiveness, and pampering luxury, making it a well-deserved winner in the hair styling game. Plus, the sleek and lightweight bottle feels amazing in your hand, adding to the overall premium experience.

reviews.review_title: Didn't love it, didn't hate it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product because I do really like the JVN Instant Recovery Serum. I didn't love this product but I also didn't hate it. Unfortunately my hair just didn't care too much about the product. I have pretty thick, wavy hair and I've seen JVN use this on their own hair and I liked the results, but I think my hair is a bit thicker than theirs.   They recommend using 1-2 pumps, but because my hair is thick I used about 2.5 pumps and my hair didn't really feel soft or hydrated after blow-drying (I used the Dyson Supersonic + Olivia Garden round brush). In the pic I attached my hair looks decent because I used a flat iron and finished it with Oribe Gold Lust hair oil, but it doesn't feel soft when I touch it (even with the hair oil). Before flat ironing my hair looked a little poofier, less shiny, and my ends didn't feel as nice as when I use my other blowout product. I also feel like my ends are getting tangled more easily, whereas my other blowout product leaves my hair super silky and smooth and I can run my fingers through my hair mor easily. Basically I was hoping to get a silky, soft and smooth result with just the Blowout Milk and avoid using a flat iron, but this product didn't do that for me.

reviews.review_text: I love this product. It is my drying go-to when I'm not airdrying. Makes my hair so much smoother and softer after drying without weighing it down. I used this before drying then the Oribe Anti Humidity hair spray to style in the pictures. In love.

reviews.review_text: The scent of all of JVNs products is truly a salon experience. I would repurchase this blowout cream for the fragrance alone. However, I also enjoy how it performs. It helps reduce frizziness and protects my hair from heat damage. Just need to be careful not to use too much, or it can end up weighing your hair down. A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_text: If you have frizzy hair - this is a game changer! This instantly creates the most soft, bouncy and shiny hair of my life. I wash my hair once a week instead of every 3-4 days and it has a great scent. I have long, fine hair and use a pea sized amount. I always feel like I didn't put any product on my hair but once I blowdry I can tell I put the right amount in. If I use a dime size amount hair will be slightly soft but a greasy feel. Still looks good but I bet if I did more than a dime it would be a bad hair day so if there's anyone not enjoying it just use barely a pump. Rub it all over your palms then glaze over your hair and wash the rest off your hands. Less is more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far, I really like this product. Iu2019ve been blowing my hair out as my preferred method for styling for over a decade. Iu2019ve tried many products over the years that have worked to varying degrees, but the main things I look for as a curly-haired girly are: something that leaves my ends (which are extremely damage-prone) soft, sleek and styled; a product that doesnu2019t sweat out at my roots and leave my crown u201cpuffyu201d at the slightest sign of humidity; and a product that leaves my hair with a NATURAL shine that isnu2019t greasy.  I came upon JVN Complete Blowout Styling Milk after a lengthy search for a new blowout cream to replace my Monat (yes, Iu2019m aware of the complaints) Studio One Blowout Cream, which has been my Holy Grail for the last 3 years. I was looking for a natural, clean product that I didnu2019t have to maintain a subscription for.  JVN Complete Blowout Styling Milk seems to be doing the trick more than anything else Iu2019ve tried. I would say it checks 2 out of 3 boxes. Styling my curly hair with solid products reduces my blowout time by 20-30 minutes, this is on par with other good products Iu2019ve used (2 minutes from pic #1 to pic #2). My ends are soft and cooperated with my round brush, my roots are lying flat with intentional volume in the correct places. However, I did not immediately notice a natural shine post-styling. My face framing pieces felt a little staticky and I feel like the end product was beautifully styled, but a little dull. Perhaps my natural hair oils over the next day or so will correct this, or perhaps I can try JVNu2019s Complete Nourishing Hair Oil Shine Drops next!  The product smells amazing and is NOT overpowering at all. Smells just like any other salon hair care product. Itu2019s not heavy. Itu2019s definitely a cream, but a lighter cream that feels quite hydrating. My hair is long, mid-torso length, and somewhat thick. I used 2.5 pumps combed through evenly and that didnu2019t weigh my hair down or make it feel oily at all. For finer hair, I suggest s

Not curly but not straight a weird inbetween lol and anytime I blow dry my hair even with product it always still is frizzy and not silky smooth. Enter this product!! My hair is shiny, smooth, smells amazing. Not funky or anything from the product. I loooove it!!

Individual hair strands are fine, but I have a lot of strands so my hair can look thicker than it actually is.   WHAT I LIKE: * lightweight * does not weigh hair down * does not leave hair greasy  * easy to apply * serves as a heat protectant * works nicely as a detangler * leaves hair soft, silky smooth, sleek and shiny, with movement and fullness to it * zero frizz * hair looks and feels healthy * a little goes a long way  AREA(S) FOR IMPROVEMENT: * None, I can think of   FYI / OTHER THOUGHTS: * Has that signature JVN scent found in shampoo and conditioner in the brand's Nurture line. To my nose, it's a mix of fresh, sweet, fruity, floral, woodsy notes, that smells wonderful! *  My hair is so soft and silky smooth that I can't stop touching my hair on days I use this product  BUY, BUY, BUY or BYE-BYE?: * It'll take me a while to make my way through this styling milk, and I plan to purchase another bottle when I do. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: JVN is a brand that intrigues me and I want to try more from the line but so far I've only dabbled with a couple of things and this was one that definitely piqued my interest.  Admittedly, it took a little bit of trial-and-error to figure out how to use it to get the best results because I have fine, straight hair and too much of this can absolutely weigh it down and leave it feeling sticky.  My personal best method is to use a single pump, apply it to barely towel-dried hair, and comb it through to distribute it well before blow-drying and I usually end up with softer, smoother hair.  Going overboard with the application definitely doesn't have the same effect, though, so I would advise experimenting with the amount used.  Overall I do like it although I feel like it's a slightly finicky product for me, personally, but I enjoy it enough that I use it often because I appreciate the end result.  *Generously gifted to me as a Sephora Community Ambassador

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product from the way it smells to the way it feels. The smell is straight out of a salon. Iu2019m obsessed with it. It gives my hair weightless volume, makes it feel hydrated and the best is that you donu2019t have to use too much! I have long hair and two squirts is enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing to dislike! I put a small amount in my hair while damp and used the roller brush and dryer to dry my hair. It comes out soft and shiny with no frizz! This one's a keeper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely, light product that I always reach for before using the blow dryer. It helps to control my frizz in humid temps, and keeps my fine hair protected from the heat of my hot tools.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: a great brand that I met through these products that I received, and I love this product from the smell so good that it has even in its packaging.  It leaves my hair very soft and easy to manage and very effective to use irons or dryers. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from influenster for my honest review. First off, I love the packaging. It makes it seem like a high end product. Second, it is a high end product. Love how it de-frizzes my hair. I bleach my hair quite often and usually my hair gets tangled and frizzy. This product gives me a boost of volume while I blow dry and makes it feel so soft. Overall itu2019s a great product for the price. Would highly recommend.
